DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Number of Years Since Last Cigarette Integer Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates the number of years since a person last smoked a cigarette.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-001 Question Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: How many years has it been since you last smoked a cigarette (even one or two puffs)

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Instruction
ReferenceDocuments.description: Enter a whole number (i.e. "4") only. Do not enter a range or fraction.
